page.title: 15Church Services in N.E.Mynd
page.content: There are three churches in this area They are all Anglican and belong to the Hereford Diocese. The church at Smethcott has about three services a month with an average of ten people in the congregation. Woolstaston church has one or two services a month with an average congregation of eleven people and there are about eight services a month at Leebotwood church which has thirteen or fourteen worshippers. Annually there are one or two weddings baptisms and funerals at each church. Once a month there is a congregation of about fifty people when a Group Service is held and the members of these churches join together in worship with three other churches of the diocese, all six churches being under the pastoral care of the one 'priest-in-charge'.
